title: 12-sai.: Chicchana Mune no Tokimeki
alternative_title: Age 12., Juuni-sai., 12歳。～ちっちゃなムネのトキメキ～
description: The story begins with Hanabi, a sixth-grade girl who is neither an adult nor a child. She deals with issues such as accidentally witnessing her homeroom teacher kissing, and worrying about experiencing physiological changes before her friends. The series depicts a 12-year-old girl's innocent worries and first love.
